author: Special Correspondent
text: A peer team from the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC), headed by V. Ramakistayya, former Vice-Chancellor, Osmania University, will visit Saraswathi Narayanan College here from March 3 to 5 for the purpose of assessment and accreditation for the second cycle. The other members of the team are G. Vazhan Arasu, Principal, St. Aloysius College, Jabalpur, and Shital Kumar Chattopadhyay of University of Kalyani, West Bengal, according to a press release from R. Kannan, Principal.
title: NAAC team visit
